thread.section_title: Southern Cross Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Southern Cross Travel Insurance | scti.co.nz
thread.title: Chris Boyce
thread.title_full: Southern Cross Travel Insurance reviewed by Chris Boyce

author: Chris Boyce
title: Chris Boyce
text: SCT paid my entire claim which was great but it took some good record keeping and persistence. From past experience I was unaware of the requirement to contact SCT after hospitalization. They were great to wave this oversight, so please be warned in the future. I will always use SCT for my travel insurance and so should you.
